about_the_game:
WELCOME TO HELL

Devilish, unfair, and damn funny – that's Hell Games!
Fallen Olympians, former tricksters, and doping offenders are now battling it out in the deepest pits of hell. Here, 1-4 players engage in an infernal competition. Grab weapons and upgrades to take down your opponents - and always watch out for the lava. May the most ruthless prevail!

BEAT ‘EM UP

Face off against friends or bots in your own realm, or jump into online mode to go head-to-head with fellow Steam players! The main thing is, make sure you end up with that well-deserved victory crown in your hands!

STAY UNFAIR

In hell, doping isn't just allowed, it's mandatory! With a whopping 8 different power-ups, you'll be boosted to an unbeatable force. Stronger, bigger, faster - maybe even invisible. Grab them quickly before your opponents get a chance!

FIGHT LIKE AN ATHLETE

Athletes aren't allowed to carry knives? No problem! In hell, sports equipment gets a whole new purpose. With a discus, spear, or hammer, you'll knock your competition out of the ring. There are a total of 8 different sports tools waiting for you to masterfully wield!

CRAFT YOUR CHAMPION

.
Define you athlete's physique and style, then dive into the arena. Command with precision using mouse and keyboard, or wield a gaming controller for ultimate control. Not feeling the setup? Remix it to match your vision.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Multicore
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Almost any 10 years old card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ Ghz Multicore
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Get ready for Hell Games: In this 4 player action arena brawler fallen Olympians, once cheaters and dopers, battle it out in the depths of hell. Knock out opponents with sports gear, power up, and strive to be the last one standing.
